messages.message: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'onClearInitialMessage'. Either include it or remove the dependency array. If 'onClearInitialMessage' changes too often, find the parent component that defines it and wrap that definition in useCallback.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [initialMessage, handleSendMessage, onClearInitialMessage]

suppressedMessages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

messages.message: Unused eslint-disable directive (no problems were reported from 'no-empty').

suggestions.desc: Add comment inside empty block statement.

suppressedMessages.message: Fast refresh only works when a file only exports components. Use a new file to share constants or functions between components.
